explanation: Lily claims she left the office at 5 PM and took the train to Eastdale. But Clue 3 reveals the last Eastdale train on Wednesday evenings departs at 4:30 PM â€” she couldn't have caught it after leaving at 5 PM. She lied about leaving, meaning she was still near the office. Clue 2 shows the plants were fine at 11 PM and no cleaning crew came Wednesday night, so the bleaching happened overnight. Clue 1 shows the bleach came from the unlocked supply closet. Lily stayed behind, waited until the last worker left, and poisoned the plants.
funFact: Indoor office plants can reduce stress by up to 37% and increase productivity by 15%, which is why many companies now hire dedicated plant care services.
